title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Interactive Learning Design for Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete nursing scenario-based collaborative projects via mobile platforms with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners achieve 90% or higher accuracy in performing nursing procedure simulations using multimedia learning materials provided via smartphones.
Learners maintain weekly interaction frequency (3+ times) with peers and instructors using mobile discussion forums and real-time chat features.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
